titles.title: A bill to require recipients of grants through the Department of Housing and Urban Development to promptly pay contractors for performing federally assisted work.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Department of Housing and Urban Development Act to require Department of Housing and Urban Development grant recipients to pay contractors promptly for performing federally assisted work.
